name:
Nintendo 3DS™ Guide: Louvre
(German Version) Update
description:
An update for "Nintendo 3DS Guide: Louvre" is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “Nintendo 3DS Guide: Louvre” should download the update.

To update the software, please start the game while your Nintendo 3DS or 2DS is connected to the internet, then enter the Settings Screen from the title screen and select “Update Guide”.

This will update the software to Version 1.1. with the following amendments:

* Changes placement of exhibitions following the completion of the restoration of the Winged Victory of Samothrace.

* Activates the Masterpieces Tour in Museum Mode.

* Adds new exhibits following the opening of the Sully Wing.

* Other adjustments have also been made to balance the game and make for a more pleasant gaming experience.

We apologise for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
